snippet: It was his first television appearance since sexual assault accusations against him became public; Manhattan prosecutors decided not to file rape charges.
abstract: It was his first television appearance since sexual assault accusations against him became public; Manhattan prosecutors decided not to file rape charges.
lead_paragraph: Greg Kelly on Friday returned to co-anchor "Good Day New York," a local morning show on the Fox station WNYW (Channel 5). It was the first television appearance by Mr. Kelly - whose father is the New York City police commissioner - since sexual assault accusations against him became public. At the beginning of the show, he alluded to a decision this week by Manhattan prosecutors not to file rape charges against him, but did not discuss the nature of the accusations against him or talk about his accuser. Read more on The City Room blog »

headline.main: Greg Kelly Returns to Morning Show
